description:
Episode 2: This is it for Krysta, the final round. I really test her trust in me by making her endure all things electro without the comfort of bondage keeping her squirming or even running away. This is a test of Krysta's will power. She has to sit still and take it all! And take the devices at the highest levels!
Sign off this tattooed beauty with a shocking farewell, where she submits to my electro lezdom and is captivated by the sound of my voice. Krysta is very obedient and very tough.
title: There is Nothing Keeping You from Running.
